examples: one of the country’s premier chefs
Last year they won the premier award at the Welsh Festival of Light Opera.
The new Institute of Contemporary Art is one of Boston's premier attractions.

meanings.def: used especially in newspapers, etc. to mean ‘prime minister’
examples: She was sworn in as premier last week.
during his 25 years as Liberal premier
He expressed his concerns in a letter to the Irish premier.
She was the first woman to hold the office of Australian state premier.

meanings.def: (in Canada) the first minister of a province or territory
